txt.en: 'Merchants have brought back troubling reports of drakes being spotted in the wilds of Belfalas. If you plan to go adventuring about out there, maybe you could bring their numbers down. The beasts are large enough to carry off horse and rider both!\n\n'If you manage to defeat any of the drakes, head to Dol Amroth and speak with Abart창rik. They will reward you for your efforts.'
Therien has asked you to lessen the drake population in Belfalas.\n\nDrakes can be found in the countryside of Belfalas.
You should let Abart창rik know that you defeated drakes in Belfalas.\n\nAbart창rik is in Dol Amroth.
Sightings of huge flying scaled beasts have been reported in the Belfalas countryside.

'You battled against drakes? I suppose I shouldn't be surprised, given the stories I've heard of you. Still, that is impressive! I had begun hearing reports of their presence but had yet to determine how to handle them.\n\n'Well, thank you for making my life that much the easier, hah!
